definition: to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: As it was dark, he stubbed his toe against the table leg.
sentences.chinese: 由於天暗看不見，他的腳趾碰到了桌子腳。

sentences.english: My garden was covered with so many butterflies that I could hardly see the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我的花園裏飛舞着很多蝴蝶，我幾乎看不見花了。

sentences.english: Don't lack the ball about. Can't you see it is crowded here?
sentences.chinese: 不要亂踢球，你看不見這兒很擠嗎？

sentences.english: The surface of the sea seems to be an invisible membrane between the water and the air.
sentences.chinese: 海的表面似乎是隔在水與空氣間的一層看不見的薄膜。

sentences.english: Now, he looked and looked but he couldn't see anything.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，他看來看去卻什麼也看不見。

sentences.english: He looks upward so that his double chin doesn't show.
sentences.chinese: 他擡頭往上看，以使他的雙下巴看不見。

sentences.english: The unseeable is very often ignored.
sentences.chinese: 看不見的東西往往會被忽略。

sentences.english: She stood there until his car was out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 她一直站在那裏，直到他的車開遠看不見了。

sentences.english: We never did see either eye.
sentences.chinese: 我們從來看不見自己的另一隻眼。

sentences.english: The old city and never see the sun, looks a lot like you and I have a dream.
sentences.chinese: 舊城裏看不見陽光，你和我的一個夢長得好像。

sentences.english: It is a caseof not being able to see the forest for the trees.
sentences.chinese: 這就是一個只看到樹而看不見林子的情況。

sentences.english: You where my eyes when couldn't see.
sentences.chinese: 當我看不見前方你就是我的眼眸。

sentences.english: Its too small petals small, almost invisible.
sentences.chinese: 它太不起眼了，花瓣兒小得幾乎看不見。

sentences.english: It is too dark for him to see anything in the room.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏太黑了，他什麼也看不見。

sentences.english: The valley was hidden from view by mist.
sentences.chinese: 溪谷隱藏在霧藹之中，看不見了。

sentences.english: It is ever the invisible that is the object of our profoundest worship.
sentences.chinese: 其實我們內心真正崇拜的東西往往是看不見的。

definition: not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
